comments:
I apologize if my early bug entry was submitted by accident.

A NullPointerException is raised when configuring link property in 
facesconfig editor.

The followings are steps to reproduce.
1. Create JSF project, create two JSP pages.
2. Open facesconfig editor. 
3. Drag and drop two JSP pages and link them together.
4. Configure link property as necessary.
5. Save project and re-enter WTP.  Not sure if this is needed.
6. Close property view.
9. Select the link between two JSP pages.
10. Right-click and select show View->Properties.

You should the following error and its stack trace.
-------------------------------------------------
   Unable to create view: An unexpected exception was thrown.

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.wst.common.ui.properties.internal.provisional.TabbedPropertySheetPage.createControl(TabbedPropertySheetPage.java:365)
	at org.eclipse.ui.views.properties.PropertySheet.doCreatePage(PropertySheet.java:130)

I fixed this bug today, it's caused by the wrong caching in FacesConfigEditor. Now it works OK, please verify, thanks.
Fixed and checked in to the CVS
